signature: List<? extends T> replace(List<? extends T>, T, List<T>)

direct_enhancements.reason: Both methods manipulate lists by adding elements, though 'replace' also removes an element before adding.

direct_enhancements.method_name: remove(List<? extends T>, List<? extends T>)
direct_enhancements.reason: Both methods manipulate lists by removing elements, though 'replace' also adds new elements after removal.
Both methods involve iterating over collections and performing conditional operations on elements, though they handle different types of data.
